item.title: Install OwnCloud in your Cubieboard with Ubuntu
item.description: Do you have your Ubuntu installed into your CubieBoard? Run this command in a Terminal (it’ll be as for your mySQL password): sudo apt-get install owncloud davfs2 mysql-server Create a database in mySQL: https://your-domain/phpmyadmin Give privilegies to your owncloud data directory: sudo chown www-data:www-data -R /path_data_owncloudÂ Enable SSL: sudo ufw allow https sudo a2enmod ssl a2ensite default-ssl sudo a2ensite default-ssl Visit your domain as: https://your-domain/owncloud or (better with https)
